overview.summary: This plan outlines a structured approach to redesigning and modernizing your website. Each phase includes specific tasks, timelines, and deliverables to keep the project on track.

goals.desc: Achieve faster page load times and better Core Web Vitals scores
Move to a modern, maintainable tech stack
Create an intuitive, responsive interface for all devices
Make it easy for the team to update and publish content
Preserve search rankings throughout the migration

phases.title: Discovery & Planning
phases.summary: Audit existing site, define requirements, and establish project scope and timeline.

tasks.detail: Document current pages, features, and content structure
Gather stakeholder input and prioritize features
Evaluate frameworks, CMS options, and hosting providers
Break down milestones and assign responsibilities
Configure repos, CI/CD, staging environment

phases.title: Design & Prototyping
phases.summary: Create wireframes, design mockups, and build an interactive prototype for stakeholder review.

tasks.detail: Low-fidelity layouts for key pages and user flows
Define colors, typography, spacing, and component library
Pixel-perfect designs for desktop and mobile
Clickable prototype for stakeholder review and testing
Present designs, gather feedback, iterate

phases.title: Frontend Development
phases.summary: Build the frontend application, implement components, and integrate with backend services.

tasks.detail: Initialize framework, configure build tools and linting
Navigation, layout, footer, and shared UI elements
Homepage, landing pages, detail pages, listing pages
Connect frontend to CMS/backend data sources
Ensure all pages work across screen sizes
Image optimization, code splitting, caching strategy

phases.title: Content Migration
phases.summary: Migrate existing content to the new platform, restructure information architecture as needed.

tasks.detail: Identify what to keep, update, or remove
Organize content into new information architecture
Transfer and optimize images, videos, and documents
Map old URLs to new, set up 301 redirects

phases.title: Testing & QA
phases.summary: Comprehensive testing across browsers, devices, and user scenarios. Fix bugs and polish.

tasks.detail: Verify functionality in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
Test on iOS and Android devices at various screen sizes
WCAG 2.1 compliance check, screen reader testing
Lighthouse audits, load testing, Core Web Vitals
Stakeholder review and final approval

phases.title: Launch & Deployment
phases.summary: Deploy to production, monitor for issues, and establish ongoing maintenance processes.

tasks.detail: Final review on staging environment
Configure domain, SSL certificates, CDN
Deploy to production with rollback plan ready
Monitor errors, performance, and user feedback
Documentation, training, and support transition

risks.mitigation: Strict change management process and documented requirements
Full backup before migration, staged rollout with validation
Lighthouse CI in pipeline, performance budgets enforced
Comprehensive redirect map, Search Console monitoring
